feed.title: BIP for standard multi-signature P2SH addresses

entry.title: BIP for standard multi-signature P2SH addresses
entry.summary: Thomas Kerin has proposed a standard for creating standard multisignature P2SH addresses given 'm', and a set of public keys. He created a PR on bitcoin/bips, using BIP0090 as a place-holder, and requested a BIP number for it now. The proposal can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/146. The message also includes Thomas Kerin's PGP key.
